name: BuildTrackHomeAutomation
0:
”Alexa, turn On Bedroom light”
”Alexa, set Bedroom Dimmer to 50%”
”Alexa, set Bedroom air conditioner to 22”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
BuildTrack Alexa enabled Home Automation allows you to control lights, fans, air conditioners, media devices and many other Buildtrack devices in your home.

Some examples:
"Alexa, turn on Hall light"
"Alexa, turn on Bedroom sleep profile"
"Alexa, set Living room fan to 5(speed)"
“Alexa, set Bedroom air conditioner to 20°" 
"Alexa, set Living room color control to Blue"

How to configure BuildTrack Home Automation skill: 
Go to the Alexa store and download the BuildTrack Home Automation skill.
1. Click on Enable Skill
2. Login with your buildtrack account details.
3. Once your account is linked, you will see account linking success message.
4. In the Alexa app or asking Alexa to "Discover Devices" will get all your elements synced in your BuildTrack account (Make sure that you have devices synced with your "BuildTrack Home Automation" Account).
5. You will see the list of devices and profiles in your alexa app and you can now start giving commands to Alexa "Turn on (device name)" , "Turn off (device name). 

For information about all BuildTrack products, go to http://www.buildtrack.in
